com.couchbase.client
Class ViewNode

java.lang.Object
  net.spy.memcached.compat.SpyObject
      com.couchbase.client.ViewNode

public class ViewNode
extends net.spy.memcached.compat.SpyObject

Establishes a connection to a single Couchbase node. Based upon http://hc.apache.org/httpcomponents-core-ga/httpcore-nio/ examples/org/apache/http/examples/nio/NHttpClientConnManagement.java
